name: MiDIA
comment: MiDIA aims at helping Chinese students find internships and full-time jobs in U.S. The website (www.midiaus.com) will be launched soon. It will provide information about job openings, media industry, resume and interview tips, and fashion in the work place. Our official Sina Weibo @MissMiDIA has 1800+ followers and our official Wechat "MiDIA北美传媒小蜜蜂" has 300+ subscribers by now.
